name: Roguish
description:
No ads, No in-app purchases, just the turn-based rpg goodness !

A truly old-school , hardcore, stat-based and retro roguelike rpg : go on a rocky treasure hunting adventure, alone or with a party (up to 4) ! Do you feel like taking on the mighty dragons guarding the One-Chest or do you prefer a more stealthy approach ?

The One-Chest is generated in a different manner every time you play as to spice things up! (hence the Rouge-ish name).
